comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Sybil E. Young married Lyman Northrop Hine (1888-1930), 10 November 1914. Maybe his first initial is wrong on the original caption, or maybe this is a relative of her husband's? Anyway, the Mr. Hine who was her first husband was a member of the 1928 US bobsled team that won a silver medal at St. Moritz; he died at 41 in a car accident in Paris. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyman_Hine www.sports-reference.com/olympics/athletes/hi/lyman-hine-... They had two children, Francis and Sybil. After Hine died, Sybil married Fred G. Clark, an oil refinery executive from Cleveland.
